section.title: NAME
section.p: size - Honors skip() and limit(), return the amount of records from current cursor to final cursor.

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.p: Honors skip() and limit(), return the amount of records from current cursor to final cursor.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Select records with the value of "age" greater than 10 in the collection "bar" and return the amount of records in the range from current cursor to final cursor.
